volunteer_experience.info: KOSS organises multiple workshops while promoting Open Source including Google Summer of Code, Git & GitHub education and Python, hosts an Ubuntu Install Fest which saw a turnover of over 200 students and helped them install and debug. Also organises and mentors the Kharagpur Winter of Code (KWoC) 2020, a GSoC inspired winter-long programming event
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Kharagpur Open Source Society
volunteer_experience.title: Executive Head

volunteer_experience.info: Quant Club is the student body aimed at increasing the awareness of Quantitative Finance amongst the student community at IIT Kharagpur. We also develop proprietary trading strategies and aim to trade with them in future.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Quant Club, IIT Kharagpur
volunteer_experience.title: Senior Quant Researcher
